name: Country Inn & Suites by Carlson _ Boise West at Meridian

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Quite new, spacious, excellent rooms. Also very good value. Recommended for business or toursism. Good breakfast included.
reviews.title: Great new hotel

likes.liked: — clean, also spotless guest laundry pool and gym
